metadata.title: CVE-2024-45440 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: core/authorize.php in Drupal 11.x-dev allows Full Path Disclosure (evenwhen error logging is None) if the value of hash_salt is file_get_contentsof a file that does not exist.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
